content.description: Start left of the yucca, head up towards the mini horizontal crack, move right towards the small vertical crack, follow this up until the rock quality changes, you've now entered the crux (slightly runout section), continue heading straight up towards the next crack, leading to a mini chimney like feature (beware loose rock) before toping out.Â
content.location: Southside wall, just before the route Send or Get Sent, look for the yucca start and a prominent large crack to the top right of the climb.

content.description: A large catchment area above Majestic Mountain Drive on the West Side of the Franklin Mountain Range. Contains a pretty high density of traditional climbs, but rock quality is variable and can suffer from loose rock. Wear a helmet as always and be prepared for some weird natural anchoring.
